data.title: A WORLD OF MUSIC; Who's Performing Where
data.meta_description: LEAD: THIS directory of music festivals includes events outside the United States and Canada judged to be of more than local interest. The details, though, are subject to change.
data.text:
LEAD: THIS directory of music festivals includes events outside the United States and Canada judged to be of more than local interest. The details, though, are subject to change.

THIS directory of music festivals includes events outside the United States and Canada judged to be of more than local interest. The details, though, are subject to change.

Festivals that have already been held are not included, but among the worthy ones that the traveler might consider next year are Days of the Wielki Theater in Warsaw, held in early March; Budapest Spring Festival, late March; Penderecki Festival in Cracow, late March; Printemps des Arts de Monte Carlo in Monaco, late March to late April, and the Salzburg Easter Festival.

The tourist offices listed on page 38 can supply additional information on this year's festivals as well as information about lodging, dining and transportation.AUSTRIA Vienna Festival May 11 to June 25

Opening ceremonies in City Hall Plaza are dedicated to the bicentennial of the French Revolution, then Vienna's festival gets under way with a co-production by the Staatsoper and Brussels Theatre Royal de la Monnaie of Mozart's ''Abduction From the Seraglio.''

Mozart's infrequently heard ''Lucio Silla'' receives a concert performance on June 4 and June 6, and on June 17, Montserrat Caballe sings the title role in a concert performance of another opera rarity, Giovanni Pacini's ''Saffo,'' written in 1840.
